languages.text: {n}Что-то напевая себе по нос, человек огромных пропорций сосредоточенно обгладывает с кости сырое мясо. Немытые рыжие волосы падают на его лицо, борода сбилась в кровавый колтун, и вы готовы поклясться, что видели, как отблеск света отразился на его необычно длинных клыках.{/n}

{n}Singing softly under his breath, the man of enormous proportions is intently stripping raw meat from a bone with his teeth. His unwashed red hair is falling into his face, his beard is matted and blood-stained, and the aforementioned teeth look more like fangs than any human equivalent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то напевая себе по нос, человек огромных пропорций сосредоточенно обгладывает с кости сырое мясо. Немытые рыжие волосы падают на его лицо, борода сбилась в кровавый колтун, и вы готовы поклясться, что видели, как отблеск света отразился на его необычно длинных клыках.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}这个身材魁梧的男人一遍轻声唱着歌，一边专注地用牙齿撕扯着手中骨头上的生肉。他脏污的红发垂到了脸上，胡须也被染得血迹斑斑。他的牙齿看起来不太像是人类的牙齿，反而更像是獠牙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Singing softly under his breath, the man of enormous proportions is intently stripping raw meat from a bone with his teeth. His unwashed red hair is falling into his face, his beard is matted and blood-stained, and the aforementioned teeth look more like fangs than any human equivalent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个身材魁梧的男人一遍轻声唱着歌，一边专注地用牙齿撕扯着手中骨头上的生肉。他脏污的红发垂到了脸上，胡须也被染得血迹斑斑。他的牙齿看起来不太像是人类的牙齿，反而更像是獠牙。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}巨大な体躯の男が鼻歌を歌いながら、歯で生肉を骨から熱心に剥ぎ取っている。汚れた赤髪は顔の前に垂れており、ひげは艶がなく血糊がべっとりとついている。肉をかみちぎる歯は人間のものというより、獣の牙のように鋭い。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Singing softly under his breath, the man of enormous proportions is intently stripping raw meat from a bone with his teeth. His unwashed red hair is falling into his face, his beard is matted and blood-stained, and the aforementioned teeth look more like fangs than any human equivalent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大な体躯の男が鼻歌を歌いながら、歯で生肉を骨から熱心に剥ぎ取っている。汚れた赤髪は顔の前に垂れており、ひげは艶がなく血糊がべっとりとついている。肉をかみちぎる歯は人間のものというより、獣の牙のように鋭い。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Cantando suavemente en voz baja, el gigantesco hombre arranca carne cruda de un hueso a dentelladas. Su pelo, rojo y sucio, le tapa la cara, tiene la barba apelmazada y sucia por la sangre y sus dientes parecen más colmillos que algo humano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Singing softly under his breath, the man of enormous proportions is intently stripping raw meat from a bone with his teeth. His unwashed red hair is falling into his face, his beard is matted and blood-stained, and the aforementioned teeth look more like fangs than any human equivalent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cantando suavemente en voz baja, el gigantesco hombre arranca carne cruda de un hueso a dentelladas. Su pelo, rojo y sucio, le tapa la cara, tiene la barba apelmazada y sucia por la sangre y sus dientes parecen más colmillos que algo humano.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Un homme aux proportions gigantesques nettoie consciencieusement les derniers morceaux de chair accrochés à un os tout en chantonnant doucement. Sa tignasse rousse lui tombe devant le visage, sa barbe emmêlée est tachée de sang et ses dents ressemblent davantage aux crocs d'un animal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Singing softly under his breath, the man of enormous proportions is intently stripping raw meat from a bone with his teeth. His unwashed red hair is falling into his face, his beard is matted and blood-stained, and the aforementioned teeth look more like fangs than any human equivalent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme aux proportions gigantesques nettoie consciencieusement les derniers morceaux de chair accrochés à un os tout en chantonnant doucement. Sa tignasse rousse lui tombe devant le visage, sa barbe emmêlée est tachée de sang et ses dents ressemblent davantage aux crocs d'un animal.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Der enorm große Mann singt leise, während er mit den Zähnen rohes Fleisch von einem Knochen reißt. Sein ungewaschenes rotes Haar hängt ihm ins Gesicht, sein Bart ist verfilzt und blutbefleckt, und besagte Zähne sehen eher wie tierische Hauer aus, nicht menschlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Singing softly under his breath, the man of enormous proportions is intently stripping raw meat from a bone with his teeth. His unwashed red hair is falling into his face, his beard is matted and blood-stained, and the aforementioned teeth look more like fangs than any human equivalent.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Kısık bir ses tonuyla şarkı söyleyen, devasa cüsseli adam; dişlerini kullanarak çiğ eti titizlikle kemikten ayırıyor. Kir pas içindeki kızıl saçları, yüzüne düşüyor. Sakalı keçeye dönmüş ve kan içinde. Bahsi geçen dişleriyse bir insana kıyasla daha çok hayvanların köpek dişlerini andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Singing softly under his breath, the man of enormous proportions is intently stripping raw meat from a bone with his teeth. His unwashed red hair is falling into his face, his beard is matted and blood-stained, and the aforementioned teeth look more like fangs than any human equivalent.{/n}

Sakalı keçeye dönmüş ve kan içinde. Bahsi geçen dişleriyse bir insana kıyasla daha çok hayvanların köpek dişlerini andırıyor.{/n}
